rows.label: bf03170100_0010
rows.name: The Blade returned to its core...

rows.label: bf03170100_0020
rows.name:
So that monster was in resonance
with the Blade...

rows.label: bf03170100_0030
rows.name:
Tora cannot resonate, stinky monster
can resonate. Not fair!

rows.label: bf03170100_0040
rows.name: But Masterpon have Hana...

rows.label: bf03170100_0050
rows.name: Oh, Hana!

rows.label: bf03170100_0060
rows.name:
If a Blade loses its Driver, it winds
up like this.

rows.label: bf03170100_0070
rows.name: So, is it, like...dead?

rows.label: bf03170100_0080
rows.name:
Nah! The crystal'll start glowing again after a bit of time.
Then a new Driver can resonate with it.

rows.label: bf03170100_0090
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf03170100_0100
rows.name: There's a but?

rows.label: bf03170100_0110
rows.name: Its memory will be totally zapped.

rows.label: bf03170100_0120
rows.name:
It'll be reborn as a new Blade.
Won't remember a thing.

rows.label: bf03170100_0130
rows.name:
Yeah?
That's pretty rough...

rows.label: bf03170100_0140
rows.name:
To have all of your past wiped out
like that...

rows.label: bf03170100_0150
rows.name:
But memories can be...painful as well.
They can be a terrible burden.

rows.label: bf03170100_0160
rows.name:
And, a Blade can live forever, as long
as the crystal exists.

rows.label: bf03170100_0170
rows.name:
It's just as well. Eternity is a long
time to collect bad memories.

rows.label: bf03170100_0180
rows.name: Homura...

rows.label: bf03170100_0190
rows.name: I'm sorry.

rows.label: bf03170100_0200
rows.name:
I was just thinking, sometimes
being able to forget is a...blessing.

rows.label: bf03170100_0210
rows.name: C'mon! Let's get finished up here!

rows.label: bf03170100_0220
rows.name: That's...

rows.label: bf03170100_0230
rows.name: A Core Crystal!

rows.label: bf03170100_0240
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: bf03170100_0250
rows.name:
Well, that where they come from. Out
of Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf03170100_0260
rows.name: This one's brand new and ready to resonate.

rows.label: bf03170100_0270
rows.name:
It'll probably end up buddying up with
a bunch of Drivers...

rows.label: bf03170100_0280
rows.name:
Every time the Driver dies, it'll forget everything and return
to its core. Eventually it'll resonate with a new Driver.

rows.label: bf03170100_0290
rows.name:
Drivers dyin', Divine Beasts dyin'...
The Blade just keeps on livin' through it all...

rows.label: bf03170100_0300
rows.name:
It's a never-ending cycle.
An eternal history.

rows.label: bf03170100_0310
rows.name: A long history. Going beyond humanity.

rows.label: bf03170100_0320
rows.name: Beyond humanity...

rows.label: bf03170150_0010
rows.name:
But... Homura already had a
body when we found her...

rows.label: bf03170150_0020
rows.name: Could her old Driver still be alive somewhere?

rows.label: bf03170150_0030
rows.name: Perhaps...
